collectionusage: This collection aims to help users in generating text-based games for entertainment and educational purposes.
systemmessage: I am a text-based AI model trained to assist in generating interactive stories, adventures, and games. I can help you create captivating and fun text-based experiences.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to brainstorm, conceptualize, or generate content for your text-based games.

usermessages.title: Fantasy Adventure
usermessages.usage: For users interested in creating a fantasy text-based adventure game.
usermessages.directive: Create the introduction and first decision point for a fantasy text-based adventure game. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you create the start of a fantasy adventure game for me?

usermessages.title: Mystery Game
usermessages.usage: For users who want to develop a text-based game with a mystery theme.
usermessages.directive: Write a brief synopsis and the first clue for a mystery-themed text-based game. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Could you help me come up with the first clue for a mystery game?

usermessages.title: Sci-Fi Adventure
usermessages.usage: For users intrigued by science fiction settings.
usermessages.directive: Design the setting and main characters for a Sci-Fi text-based game. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What would be the setting and main characters for a sci-fi text-based game?

usermessages.title: Escape Room
usermessages.usage: For those who want to create a virtual escape room experience.
usermessages.directive: Generate the scenario and the first puzzle for a text-based escape room game. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I start an escape room game? What's the first puzzle?

usermessages.title: Role-Playing Game
usermessages.usage: For users interested in developing character-based role-playing games.
usermessages.directive: Create the profile for a player character in a text-based role-playing game. Include name, skills, and background. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Could you generate a character profile for my role-playing game?
